update() - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Updates the animation timer, sprite flipping direction, and region of the sprite to the current animation frame.

Updates and returns the frames of the animation based on an external animation timer.
update() - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AtlasAnimation
Updates and returns the frame of the animation based on the internal animation timer.
update() - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.math.Interpolator
Updates the Interpolator.currentTime and applies it to the interpolation, returning the value produced.
